snippet: The preacher who spent millions of dollars last year to publicize his prophecy of global destruction has conceded that he was wrong.
abstract: Harold Camping, the preacher who spent millions of dollars in 2011 to publicize his prophecy of global destruction, concedes that he was wrong.
lead_paragraph: The preacher who spent millions of dollars last year to publicize his prophecy of global destruction has conceded that he was wrong.
